item.title: A Flexible and Accurate Player Event System [Thread Safe]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Fox2007, post:25, topic:477037”]This isnt Clawz work. Its Graham’s from Rune-Server
Unless Claws = Grahm, but I somehow doubt it.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/302738-cycle-based-task-manager.html

Unless this is different in some way ???
Looks alittle different, but pretty much functions the same way.
Pretty useless tbh to post this, as most server nowadays already have this.[/quote]
I’m pretty sure your mentally retarded, or you haven’t looked at the code.

Our systems are completely different, how?

[ul][li]Grahams uses polling and queues, mine does not[/li]
[li]Grahams uses an iterator to iterate over the elements while I use a loop[/li]
[li]My event system is bound to a player, while his is “global” in a sense[/li][/ul]

And the design concepts of both are just completely different. The only thing I think are the same about the two is the fact that they both run on their own threads. Please don’t make accusations like that because it makes you seem like a senseless moron.

If you still don’t believe me, I completely redesigned this and you can find it here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/wihsxh1qqmefo7b/Bj0-EfqdE_

Read full topic
